tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE logistics_providers (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(50),
  provider_location VARCHAR(100),
  contact_person VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE third_party_logistics_providers (
    provider_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    provider_contact_person TEXT,
    provider_email TEXT,
    provider_phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE shipments (
    shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_id INT NOT NULL,
    recipient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending',
    FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES logistics_providers(provider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE shipment_details (
    shipment_detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_id INT NOT NULL,
    item_description TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    weight FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (shipment_id) REFERENCES shipments(shipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE delivery_updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_id INT NOT NULL,
    update_message TEXT,
    update_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (shipment_id) REFERENCES shipments(shipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE logistics_orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_id INT,
  order_date DATE,
  delivery_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES third_party_logistics_providers(provider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE order_details (
  order_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (order_id, product_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES logistics_orders(order_id)
);
